item.title: Building a Google Cloud Event Bridge for Okta Syslogs
item.description: Okta natively integrates with AWS EventBridge, but what about Google Cloud users? Here’s how to bridge that gap and unlock real-time alerting, org-wide Okta dashboards, and BigQuery Okta event archives.
